subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Marcel Hirscher of Austria, the defending overall World Cup champion, was fastest in both runs to post an emphatic victory in a night slalom Tuesday in Madonna di Campiglio, Italy.
snippet: Marcel Hirscher of Austria, the defending overall World Cup champion, was fastest in both runs to post an emphatic victory in a night slalom Tuesday in Madonna di Campiglio, Italy.
